name: Verify Environmental Interaction
description: Validates that environmental objects can be interacted with properly using E key or left mouse button.
testObjective: Ensure environmental interaction system works consistently across different object types.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player is in ship with various interactable objects

steps.action: Approach an interactable object (e.g., terminal, button)
steps.expected: Object shows green rectangular outline indicating it's interactable

steps.action: Press E key on the interactable object
steps.expected: Interaction occurs (terminal opens, button activates, etc.)

steps.action: Click left mouse button on the object
Try interacting with a non-interactable object
steps.expected: No interaction occurs, no green outline appears

postconditions: Both E key and left mouse button work for interactions
